Articles.Content:
I just had this idea, and couldn't find anything similar, so I figured I'd toss it out there.

Essentially, set up collision-less gravity/SOI sources for L-4/-L5 for major bodies.  if collision-less or physics-less isn't possible (I know nothing about Kopericus, other than it creates planets), maybe a small 'trapped' asteroid placeholder instead.

What do people think?

I know that Whitecat has plans for such a feature in his Orbital Decay Mod for the future.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/116818-113-orbital-decay-v152-17072016-total-overhaul/&page=1
